reviews.author: Elizabeth Cox
reviews.review: I would highly recommend Jessica for any of your rental needs. She is quick to respond, very professional and very realistic when it comes to income and expenses. I was interested in turning my home into an AirBnB and she came out promptly

ownerResponse.text: Thank you very much! Grateful for you :)

reviews.author: Emelie Goodman
reviews.review: Very impressed with Jessica at NW Property Collective response time and management skills. Im a local realtor and Jessica continues to serve my clients stage, design and rent out their homes short term netting them the highest dollar

ownerResponse.text: As a small business, we really appreciate that you took the time to leave us a positive review. We look forward to working together again soon!

reviews.author: Jenn Fluke
reviews.review: The home is very comfortable. Checking in was easy and the property management team was fast to help with anything.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for trusting our expertise, Jenn! It was a delight to meet you.

reviews.author: Erin Luna
reviews.review: With Northwest Property Collective, I received prompt and professional communication regarding my inquiry. Jessica is extremely knowledgeable, very approachable, and pays thoughtful attention to every detail. I am confident Northwest Property Collective truly has the clients best interests in mind when managing a property.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you very much Erin! I appreciate you :)

reviews.author: Jeffrey Brooks
reviews.review: The place was beautiful and Jessica was fabulous - so great we rented again for next year.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Jeff, you are an ideal guest! Looking forward to next year already :)

reviews.author: Phil Zeutenhorst
reviews.review: Jessica was great. House had everything for a wonderful stay. location was great too.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks Phil! You were a great guest, come stay again!

reviews.author: Mary hmb1968 B
reviews.review: Jessica is professional, prompt and responsive. Always willing to help and goes the extra mile!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for being such a valued client, I adore you and your home!
